mutants.mutated_line: s_list = [word for word in s_list if word == target]

def transform_sequence(s, target):
    s_list = s.replace(',', '').split()
    s_list = [word for word in s_list if word == target]
    return s_list

def transform_sequence(s, target):
    s_list = s.replace('', '').split()
    s_list = [word for word in s_list if word != target]
    return s_list

def transform_sequence(s, target):
    s_list = s.replace(',', 'MUTATED').split()
    s_list = [word for word in s_list if word != target]
    return s_list
